transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Hi, Manish sir, good morning.

Customer: Ji sir boliye.

Executive: A Rickam baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se. Kaise hain? Thoda der mein sir call kijiye thoda der mein.

Customer: Kitne baje isme?

Executive: 12 baje.

Executive: Theek hai, le lijiye sir. Waise maine whatsapp pe aapko detail bhej diya tha sir. Agar aap free ho na to main ek baar whatsapp pe unke product pe main add kar dunga, add kar dunga.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asked when to call back.



Resolution:

- Executive said to call back at 12 PM.

- Executive offered to add product details on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, product details, whatsapp
